sources.title: The Unseen (1945)
sources.description: David Fielding, who has recently lost his wife, moves into a new neighborhood under a cloud of suspicion. Many feel that his wife's death in a car crash was no accident. Elizabeth Howard, the governess he hires to look after his children, makes it her mission to find out the truth. When other murders seem to be following David to his new town, Elizabeth investigates with the help of David's son Barnaby. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-unseen-1945/

sources.title: The Unseen
sources.description: Title: The Unseen Summary: A secretive widower hires a governess for his children, a willful boy and impressionable girl. Strange occurrences and the governess's curiosity lead her to unlock the secrets of the mysterious and uninhabited brownstone next door. Directed by: Lewis Allen Actors: Joel McCrea, Gail Russell, Herbert Marshall Production Company: Paramount Pictures Release Date: August 1945 (Peru) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Governess Elizabeth Howard fears that David, both her widowed employer and the man she loves, could be the strangler that's stalking women in the small New England town where they live. So does the police. His little son Barnaby knows who the killer is but won't tell. Elizabeth becomes convinced that the killer is now stalking her as well.

metadata.Plot: Governess Elizabeth Howard fears that David, both her widowed employer and the man she loves, could be the strangler that's stalking women in the small New England town where they live. So do the police. His little son Barnaby knows who the killer is but won't tell. Elizabeth becomes convinced that the killer is now stalking her as well.
metadata.Writer: Hagar Wilde, Raymond Chandler, Ken Englund
